text: Aroura may refer to: *Aroura, a 1971 composition for strings by Iannis Xenakis. *Arura, an Homeric word for earth, land. *Bani Zeid al-Sharqiya, a Palestinian village. * Aroura, a unit of surface used for measuring land in Ancient Egypt as reported by Greek sources. One aroura was 1000x1000 cubits, that is about 2756.5 square metres. ==See also== *Aurora (disambiguation)
title: Aroura
